A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Did i have fun watching this movie?   Yes. Cause it's Star Wars.  Is this a good movie?  Can't say it is.  Is it a good sequel / saga episode.  Hard NO.  Movie chooses to ignore themes and character archs from previous episodes.  The Last Jedi is way too crowded and forces themes and character archs that dont feel relevant or earned.   Additionally there are logic holes throughout the movie that just take the viewer out of the world.  Was excited after The Force Awakens.  I am no longer excited for episode IX.
